messages.msgSnippet: Hello Mary, I wanted to respond to you  TARGET comment. I did not want to give to the local school eather. I did at first. Now I do not want to and I am
messages.messageBody:
Hello Mary,

I wanted to respond to you " TARGET" comment.

I did not want to give to the local school eather. I did at first. Now I do not want to and I am having a hard time getting them to take it off of my bill.

I have moved sense I started and am now home schooling. Unless they want to donate to me. LOL

_________________________________________________________________________-

<<. My local Target was shocked when I wouldn't give them a school
name to donate proceeds to from my credit card there. (money doesn't
come from me)

Mary B<<<<









Happy St. Patrick's Day!!

Marie Alexander
